alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Lee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 2:10PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Itawamba and southeastern Lee Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 210 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tremont, or near Fulton, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fulton, Mantachie, Tremont, New Salem, Evergreen, Clay, Abney, Cardsville, Turon, Tilden, Ballardsville, Dorsey, Jacinto, Cadamy and Richmond. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
